name: Ａｃｅ Ａｔｔｏｒｎｅｙ
description:
Warning: Horror contents

※It's a fangame, not relative to Ace Attorney official
※Includes spoilers of Ace Attorney 1~4
※It's just a demo, not in very good quality

It's not usually picked up by AA fanbase, but I've always thought that AA1~4 has very nice usage of psych horror elements in non-horror game.
And I somehow noticed that AA4 might have some homage of a game called "Serial Experiments Lain", which is famous for being gloomy, creepy and weird.
From that, I was inspired to make these artworks and a fangame with a concept of "What if AA was a horror game with a PSX aesthetic?", showing AA1~2 timeline, focuses on Naruhodo(Phoenix)'s trauma. Down below, I'll put my fake package artworks done by me, and the demo of the game itself.

You can also play without downloading the game in this links (Supports mobile devices):
Korean한국어 https://shinhogoesreal.postype.com/post/12599126
Japanese日本語 https://note.com/shinhogoesreal/n/n84255e94ed28
English https://www.tumblr.com/shinhogoesreal/687988451633725440/what-if-ace-attorney-wa...

Be aware that
*It has indirect spoilers of AA1~4.
*includes trigger to exclusion, and horror contents using unrealistic space and human face, low-poly graphic, jump scare.
*I maximized the horror elements of original game. It is in the game, but not like this. I'm hoping for you to not overread the original game as a horror because of this fangame.
*Some of the incidents drawn in this game is not a cannon.
*English is not my first language. It was originally written in Korean.

Additional Tip
*Able to play in 3 languages. Korean한국어, Japanese日本語, and English. 
*If you're not comfortable playing with keyboard, you can play it with mouse clicks instead. Click anywhere instead of Enter, click the borders instead of Arrow keys.
*Press Space bar to play in full screen. However, it is not recommended since it will not work in Result screen.

If you enjoyed the game, please leave a comment to this post, or my twitter account ( https://twitter.com/milfhodo ).
